grafana.name: Grafana
grafana.desc: Select an imported Grafana server. You must import before you select from the list.
grafana.deleteTips: Are you sure you want to remove the Grafana server

create.name: Name
create.nameDesc: Please input the name of this Grafana server.
create.urlDesc: Please provide the URL of the Grafana server. Or create a server with Amazon Grafana service.
create.tokenDesc: Please provide the token for the solution to access the Grafana server.
create.dataSourcePermission: Check Grafana data source creation permission

engine.selectEngineDesc: Choose the analytics engine that best suits your needs.
engine.descOpenSearch: An AWS-managed service run and scale OpenSearch clusters, providing fast access and query on log data.
engine.descLightEngine: An interactive query service that makes it easy to analyze data directly in S3 using standard SQL.

create.sampleDashboardDesc: Create a predefined sample dashboard in the Log analytics engine.
create.centralBucketDesc: This bucket is used for long-term storage and management of data for analytical, reporting, and visualization purposes.
create.centralTableDesc: Input the table name in the Data Catalog for the logs.
create.logProcessorExpDesc: Input the interval for running the log processor. This value will affect the latency of converting raw logs into processed logs. see <0>Rate-based schedules</0>
create.logMergerExpDesc: The expression that defines when the log merge runs. For more information and examples, see <0>Cron-based schedules</0>
create.logArchiveExpDesc: The expression that defines when the log archive runs. For more information and examples, see <0>Cron-based schedules</0>
create.logMergerAgeDesc: Small file retention days, with a default value of 7, indicates that logs stored for more than 7 days will be merged to large files. This value can be adjusted as needed.
create.logArchiveAgeDesc: Delete aged logs from the S3 Bucket. Logs stored for more than the retention period will be moved to the archived bucket and delete 3 days later.
create.errorLogArchiveAgeGteOne: Log archive age should be greater or equal to 1 day
create.errorLogArchiveAgeGteLogMergerAge: Log merge time should be less than log archive time
create.errorLogMergerAgeGteOne: Log merger age should be greater or equal to 1 day
create.errorLogProcessorScheduleExp: Log processor schedule should be more than 1 minute.
create.errorCronExpression: Please provide a valid Cron expression.
create.errorTableNameValidation: Table name can only contain letters (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-), and underscore (_).
